name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: CS2 - Steam & Buff163 Item Search Box

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A search box where you can search for everything related to CS2

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
It's designed to search for CS2 items without opening Steam website and Buff163.

Key Features:

-It allows you to search for items quickly and easily without opening the Steam website and Buff163.
-Eliminates the need to remember lengthy or complex item names.

Simply type the first word of the item you want to search for and this extension will quickly suggest the item you are looking for.
